sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of DuPont topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.5%.
Year to date, DuPont registers a 9.0% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is JPMorgan Chase, trading down 0.8%.
JPMorgan Chase is showing a gain of 6.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot, trading down 0.7%, and Nike, trading up 0.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
